creator: jseaman@pharsalia.com
text:
I am running under cygwin.  There is a line in the environment that does not 
contain an "=". This is an entry for PS1 command prompt that is a multiline 
entry. I am using the following line in my build.xml file 
<property name="env" environment="env."/>
This attempts to read in the environment but throws an exception and bails out 
when it hits a line that does not contain an "=". The code that does this is in 
src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/Property.java
line 247. This code looks for an "=" but if one doesn't exist in the line it is 
parsing it gets an StringOutOfBounds exception because the variable "pos" is -1.
I suggest the code look for the error condition and check for -1 and not jus
throw a build exception.
